name: Bompoe
description:
Bomberman-like game with extra/different features like "Sight", which is refer to the visible area based on the player's position. Player has 4 skills and they can be upgraded via tissues dropped by monsters.  Also there are power ups that provides time-limited bonuses/penalties in game. There are currently 7 levels.

Bompoe is my first game that I developed. I would greatly appreciate it if you kindly give me some feedback.

Controls:
  • Movement: W, A, S, D
  • Drop Bomb: Space
  • Zoom In/Out: Num+, Num-
  • Upgrade Skill: 1, 2, 3, 4
Download & install instructions:

Download and extract Bompoe_v0.1.rar file, then run Bompoe.exe file in the extracted folder.
